argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zlmclm.w | |- W = ( ZMod ` G ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_zlmlmod | |- ( G e. Abel <-> W e. LMod ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_biimpi | |- ( G e. Abel -> W e. LMod ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-zring | |- ZZring = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_zlmsca | |- ( G e. Abel -> ZZring = ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl5reqr | |- ( G e. Abel -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_zsubrg | |- ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_a1i | |- ( G e. Abel -> ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_isclmi | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` W ) = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) /\ ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> W e. CMod ) |
| 11 | 3, 6, 8, 10 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( G e. Abel -> W e. CMod ) |
| 12 |  | #P_clmlmod | |- ( W e. CMod -> W e. LMod ) |
| 13 | 12, 2 | #P_sylibr | |- ( W e. CMod -> G e. Abel ) |
| 14 | 11, 13 | #P_impbii | |- ( G e. Abel <-> W e. CMod ) |
